summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DocPortal dashboard components. All dashboard APIs are connected to live backend and working correctly. Client Portal, Provider Dashboard, Messages, Appointment Booking, and Billing sections all load with live data from the API.

minor.issue: Returns 404 when no provider is assigned to client - this is expected behavior but could show a friendlier message

ui_bugs.issue: React key warning: 'Each child in a list should have a unique key prop' in ClientPortal render method

action_items: Fix React key warning in ClientPortal component - add unique key prop to list items
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: datetime.date serialization issue in appointment_routes.py - date objects now converted to ISO string format for MongoDB storage
Fixed: /api/auth/users/providers endpoint was using undefined 'database' variable - now correctly uses users_collection and excludes _id and password fields
context_for_next_testing_agent: All dashboard components are now connected to live backend APIs. Client Portal shows stats (upcoming appointments, pending payments, messages, completed sessions) and upcoming appointments list. Provider Dashboard shows income stats, today's appointments, active clients, and pending notes. Messages section loads with HIPAA-compliant messaging interface. Appointment Booking shows providers list from database and allows booking with video link generation. Billing section shows invoices with payment functionality (MOCKED - Stripe payments simulated). Dark mode toggle works on all pages.

backend_api_tests.client_provider: PASS (404 expected when no provider assigned)

frontend_ui_tests.client_dashboard_loads: PASS - shows live stats and appointments
frontend_ui_tests.appointment_booking_page: PASS - shows providers list from database
frontend_ui_tests.appointment_booking_flow: PASS - successfully books appointment with video link
frontend_ui_tests.messages_page: PASS - loads with HIPAA-compliant messaging interface
frontend_ui_tests.billing_page: PASS - shows invoices and payment form
frontend_ui_tests.dark_mode_toggle: PASS - works on all dashboard pages

fixes_applied.issue: get_all_providers endpoint was using undefined 'database' variable and returning _id field
fixes_applied.fix: Changed to use users_collection and added projection to exclude _id and password

fixes_applied.issue: datetime.date objects not serializable by MongoDB
fixes_applied.fix: Added date to string conversion using isoformat() before MongoDB insert

mocked_integrations.stripe_payments: MOCKED - Simulated payment processing, no real charges
mocked_integrations.google_meet: MOCKED - Placeholder video links generated (format: meet.google.com/xxx-yyyy-zzz)
